PhonebookFaculty Staff Students As PDF University Directory Search People Overview Name Search by name Title Search by title Location Search by location Apply Reset Pete Keleher Associate Professor Email: kelehercs[.dot.]umd[.dot.]edu Phone: (301) 405-0345 Location: IRB 5146 Website: http://pete.kelehers.me Education: Ph.D., Rice University, 1995 Appointments: CS Research Areas: Systems, Networking, and Architecture, Cybersecurity and Cryptography Interest Areas: distributed file systems, peer-to-peer systems and operating systems Honors and Awards Year Type Org. Name 1996 Award NSF NSF CAREER Mentions 2006 Jik-Soo Kim's paper, Resource Discovery Techniques in Distributed Desktop Grid Environments", received a best paper award at the International Conference on Grid Computing in Barcelona, Spain.
